Sentencas: Organic waste exploitation is crucial for waste emissions restraint in air, soil and water.
Titulo: Experimental Analysis and Model Validation on the Performance of Impregnated Activated Carbons for the Removal of Hydrogen Sulfide (H2S) from Sewage Biogas

Sentencas: This type of waste can be exploited to produce biogas, a valuable fuel exploitable for energy purposes.
Titulo: Experimental Analysis and Model Validation on the Performance of Impregnated Activated Carbons for the Removal of Hydrogen Sulfide (H2S) from Sewage Biogas

Sentencas: A circular approach for energy production is much cleaner and more sustainable than the traditional linear approach.
Titulo: Experimental Analysis and Model Validation on the Performance of Impregnated Activated Carbons for the Removal of Hydrogen Sulfide (H2S) from Sewage Biogas

Sentencas: In this work, organic waste was used for biogas production to feed a highly efficient solid oxide fuel cell power generator, which requires an ultra-purified fuel.
Titulo: Experimental Analysis and Model Validation on the Performance of Impregnated Activated Carbons for the Removal of Hydrogen Sulfide (H2S) from Sewage Biogas

Sentencas: Commercial sorbents were experimentally studied in conjunction with a dynamic adsorption model to predict the breakthrough time and organize the material change-over.
Titulo: Experimental Analysis and Model Validation on the Performance of Impregnated Activated Carbons for the Removal of Hydrogen Sulfide (H2S) from Sewage Biogas

Sentencas: In the presence of 0.1% oxygen in the gas mixture, AirDep (R) CKC showed a marked increase in the adsorption capacity (from 3.91 to 84.87 mg/g), overcoming SulfaTrap (R) R8G (49.91 mg/g).
Titulo: Experimental Analysis and Model Validation on the Performance of Impregnated Activated Carbons for the Removal of Hydrogen Sulfide (H2S) from Sewage Biogas

Sentencas: The effect of several operating parameters on adsorption capacity was evaluated: inlet H2S concentration, filter geometry and gas mixture velocity.
Titulo: Experimental Analysis and Model Validation on the Performance of Impregnated Activated Carbons for the Removal of Hydrogen Sulfide (H2S) from Sewage Biogas

Sentencas: Experimental data revealed that adsorption capacity increases with initial H2S concentration, following the typical trend of the Langmuir isotherm.
Titulo: Experimental Analysis and Model Validation on the Performance of Impregnated Activated Carbons for the Removal of Hydrogen Sulfide (H2S) from Sewage Biogas

Sentencas: Model simulations were in good agreement compared to experimental results, with an average relative error lower than 7%.
Titulo: Experimental Analysis and Model Validation on the Performance of Impregnated Activated Carbons for the Removal of Hydrogen Sulfide (H2S) from Sewage Biogas

Sentencas: A sensitivity analysis on the adsorption capacity was accomplished considering parameters from operational and empirical correlations.
Titulo: Experimental Analysis and Model Validation on the Performance of Impregnated Activated Carbons for the Removal of Hydrogen Sulfide (H2S) from Sewage Biogas
